name: MLParameterKey
desc: The keys for the parameter dictionary in a model configuration or a model update context.

items.name: func scoped(to: String) -> MLParameterKey
items.desc: Creates a copy of a parameter key and adds the scope to it.

items.name: class var numberOfNeighbors: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the number of neighbors that adjusts the affinity of a k-nearest-neighbor model.

items.name: class var linkedModelFileName: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the linked model’s filename.

items.name: class var linkedModelSearchPath: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the linked model’s search path.

items.name: class var weights: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the weights of a layer in a neural network model.

items.name: class var biases: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the biases of a layer in a neural network model.

items.name: class var learningRate: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the optimizer’s learning rate parameter.

items.name: class var momentum: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the stochastic gradient descent (SGD) optimizer’s momentum parameter.

items.name: class var miniBatchSize: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the optimizer’s mini batch-size parameter.

items.name: class var beta1: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the Adam optimizer’s first beta parameter.

items.name: class var beta2: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the Adam optimizer’s second beta parameter.

items.name: class var eps: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the Adam optimizer’s epsilon parameter.

items.name: class var epochs: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the optimizer’s epochs parameter.

items.name: class var shuffle: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the shuffle parameter, a Boolean value that determines whether the model randomizes the data between epochs.

items.name: class var seed: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the seed parameter that initializes the random number generator for the shuffle option.
